name: Card Sorter
description:
A card-sorting puzzle game. Sort the cards from lowest-to-highest, aces high!

Made in under 3 hours for TriJam 48 (closer to an hour and a half). I got sick so I wasn't able to put as much energy/thought into this week.

CONTROLS

Mouse-click on the cards adjacent to the empty spot to select them, then click the empty spot to move them there.

Press R to reset the level.

Press F11 to toggle fullscreen.

GOAL

To win each level, you must sort the cards from lowest-to-highest face-value, left-right, top-down, with aces having the highest value. The bottom-right corner must be left empty in the final solution.
